subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Boston, having languished for most of the season, has the chance to play spoiler to the Orioles, who are tied for the lead in the wild card race, though the Red Sox fell short to start their weekend series.
snippet: Boston, having languished for most of the season, has the chance to play spoiler to the Orioles, who are tied for the lead in the wild card race, though the Red Sox fell short to start their weekend series.
